"James," she said, breathing in hard at him for the tobacco remnant. "Was he there?"

"Yeah, he was there. He wasn't wearing a shirt."

"He's grown out his hair." 

"He has his briefcase."

"That's never a good sign."

"I tried to talk to him."

"You did?"

"He asked me for a lighter."
